754861186230649063.description: The Turbo Music Bot started as a small tool to automatically insert Spotify links sent to the discord #music channel into a Spotify playlist. Over time, it became something much bigger. A place to share, discover, rate, and discuss music.

974129951907397642.description: Computer Boy is an AI powered bot that generates a nickname for a user based on the introduction they post. It was written using the Co:here AI platform.

981309415313530940.description: Pride Kid is a modified version of the music bot, written to facilitate the Good Kid Street Team Pride 2022 event. During the event, users would submit songs by LGBTQ+ artists to a special thread. The bot would then add them to a playlist and grant the user a special role.
